    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AccountUpdatePage
    AccountUpdatePage allows users to update their account information including name, email, and password.
    AdminHomePage
    AdminPage class represents the user interface for the admin user.
    AdministrationSearchPage
    This page shows the list of users and provides the ability to search for a user.
    AdminSetupPage
    The SetupAdmin class handles the setup process for creating an administrator account.
    Answer
     
    Answers
     
    AnswerTests
     
    AnswerUpdatePage
     
    AnswerValidator
     
    ConversationSpyPage
    This page displays the direct message conversation between two users
    DatabaseHelper
    The DatabaseHelper class is responsible for managing the connection to the database, performing operations such as user registration, login validation, and handling invitation codes.
    DatabaseTestingAutomation
     
    DialogPage
    A template for a dialog box.
    DialogReturns
    An enumerated type for the returns of dialog pages.
    DialogTypes
    An enumerated type for dialog pages.
    EmailValidationTestingAutomation
    Title: EmailValidationTestingAutomation Class.
    EmailValidator
    A basic validator for provided email addresses.
    FirstPage
    FirstPage class represents the initial screen for the first user.
    HelpDialogPage
     
    InvitationPage
    Allows admins to generate invite codes for new users.
    Message
    Objects of this class represent one message between two users.
    MessagePage
    This page displays the direct message conversation with a given user and allows new messages to be sent.
    Messages
    A collection of messages.
    MessageSpyPage
    Allows staff and admins to retrieve the DMs between two users.
    MessageTests
    Tests the DatabaseHelper's message methods.
    MessageUserListPage
    This page shows the list of users for which a direct message conversation exists with the given user.
    MessageValidator
    An input validation class for messages.
    ModerationForUserPage
    This page displays the activity of a user.
    ModerationTests
     
    PasswordEvaluationTestingAutomation
    Title: PasswordEvaluationTestingAutomation Class.
    PasswordEvaluator
     
    Question
     
    QuestionAnswerValidationTestingAutomation
    Title: UsernameRecognitionTestingAutomation Class.
    QuestionListPage
    CREDIT: I used the following tutorials for JavaFX things: Scrollable list: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/30105001/how-to-create-a-scrollable-panel-of-components-in-javafx Hyperlinks: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/38855779/how-to-add-a-actionlistener-to-a-label-in-javafx Add items to top of page: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/29603574/add-new-row-at-top-fxml-tableview Checkbox documentation: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/javafx/api/javafx/scene/control/CheckBox.html Choicebox: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/javafx/api/javafx/scene/control/CheckBox.html TextArea: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/javafx/api/javafx/scene/control/TextArea.html
    QuestionPage
     
    Questions
     
    QuestionTests
    Tests the DatabaseHelper's question methods.
    QuestionUpdatePage
     
    QuestionValidator
     
    RefDialogTypes
    An enumerated type to determine which type of RefMessageDialog to display.
    RefMessageDialogPage
    A specialized dialog page that allows staff members (or higher) to send a reference to a message, review, answer, or question in a message to another user.
    Review
    Represents a review of a question or answer
    Reviewer
    This class represents a reviewer and their score.
    ReviewerRequestsPage
    This page displays the questions and answers posted by a user requesting the reviewer role.
    ReviewerRequestsUsersPage
    This page shows the list of users that have requested the reviewer role.
    ReviewerRequestTests
    Tests the reviewer request methods in the database.
    ReviewerStringTests
     
    ReviewerWeightingTests
     
    ReviewManage
    Wrappers for database functions
    ReviewPage
    This page houses the reviews for a question or answer.
    ReviewTests
     
    SetupAccountPage
    SetupAccountPage class handles the account setup process for new users.
    SetupLoginSelectionPage
    The SetupLoginSelectionPage class allows users to choose between setting up a new account or logging into an existing account.
    StartCSE360
    Application Entry point
    UnitTests
     
    UpdateReviewerScoresPage
    This page shows the list of users that have requested the reviewer role.
    User
    The User class represents a user entity in the system.
    UserHomePage
    This page allows users to navigate to different modules of the application.
    UserLoginPage
    The UserLoginPage class provides a login interface for users to access their accounts.
    UsernameRecognitionTestingAutomation
    Title: UsernameRecognitionTestingAutomation Class.
    UserNameRecognizer
     
    WelcomeLoginPage
    The WelcomeLoginPage class displays a welcome screen for authenticated users.
